mapper.insert: insert into files(file_no, book_no, filename, fileurl, book_type, filetype) values (file_no_seq.nextval, #{book_no}, #{filename}, #{fileurl}, #{book_type}, #{filetype})
mapper.delete: delete from files where book_no = #{book_no} and book_type = #{book_type}
mapper.select: select FILEURL from tbl_attach where book_no = #{book_no} order by regdate
